ActDepartment of Employment and Social Development Act
PrecisReappointment of MARGOT MARY DOUGLAS BALLAGH of Ottawa, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Social Security Tribunal to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending September 30, 2017 and her designation as a Vice-Chairperson of the Income Security Section, effective May 6, 2017.
